result.eng: I don't like his talk. I don't like what he says.
result.ga: Ní maith liom a chuid cainte
result.orig: Ní maith liom a chuid cainte
result.html: Ní maith liom a chuid cainteI don't like his talk. I don't like what he says.
result.ponchtml: Ní maiṫ liom a ċuid cainteI don't like his talk. I don't like what he says.

result.eng: His talk was a little obscure.
result.ga: Bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléir
result.orig: Bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléir
result.html: Bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléirHis talk was a little obscure.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ċuid cainte rud beag doiléirHis talk was a little obscure.

result.eng: My money was leaving me fast.
result.ga: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mear

result.html: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mearMy money was leaving me fast.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mo ċuid airgid ag imeaċt uaim go mearMy money was leaving me fast.

result.eng: I was stooping over my books.
result.ga: Bhí mé cromtha ar mo chuid leabhar
result.orig: Bhí mé cromtha ar mo chuid leabhar
result.html: Bhí mé cromtha ar mo chuid leabharI was stooping over my books.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé cromṫa ar mo ċuid leaḃarI was stooping over my books.

result.eng: She spent the rest of the evening knitting.

result.html: Chaith sí an chuid eile den tráthnóna ag cniotáilShe spent the rest of the evening knitting.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sí an ċuid eile den tráṫnóna ag cniotáilShe spent the rest of the evening knitting.

result.eng: Put on your clothes.

result.eng: What colour is your hair?

result.ponchtml: Cén daṫ atá ar do ċuid gruaigeWhat colour is your hair?

result.eng: I see a big pile of money in my visions.

result.eng: I beg your pardon for my atrocious Irish.

result.html: Gabhaim pardún agat as mo chuid droch-GhaeilgeI beg your pardon for my atrocious Irish.

result.ponchtml: Ġearr mé mo ċuid gruaigeI've cut my hair.

result.eng: He likes playing with his toys.

result.eng: Reveal your opinions. Tell us what you think.
result.ga: Nocht do chuid tuairimí

result.ponchtml: Noċt do ċuid tuairimíReveal your opinions. Tell us what you think.

result.eng: I didn't get recognition for my work.

result.eng: Here is your money back.
result.ga: Seo duit do chuid airgid ar ais

result.html: Seo duit do chuid airgid ar aisHere is your money back.
result.ponchtml: Seo duit do ċuid airgid ar aisHere is your money back.

result.eng: These are my daughters.
result.ga: Seo mo chuid iníonacha
result.orig: Seo mo chuid iníonacha
result.html: Seo mo chuid iníonachaThese are my daughters.
result.ponchtml: Seo mo ċuid iníonaċaThese are my daughters.

result.eng: After he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ga: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise

result.ponchtml: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ġearmáin ar feaḋ ḋá ḃliain ṫáinig feaḃas mór ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.

result.eng: Although he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.

result.eng: His hair is almost gone.
result.ga: Tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imithe

result.ponchtml: Tá a ċuid gruaige beagnaċ imiṫeHis hair is almost gone.

result.eng: Most of the people are here.

result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuid is mó de na daoine anseoMost of the people are here.

result.eng: Most of the work is done.

result.html: Tá an chuid is mó den obair déantaMost of the work is done.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuid is mó den obair déantaMost of the work is done.

result.eng: What you're saying seems true.

result.html: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do ċuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.

result.eng: Your hair is very long.

result.ponchtml: Tá do ċuid gruaige an-ḟadaYour hair is very long.

result.eng: My mathematical skills are improving.

result.eng: Gaudí's buildings are a little strange.

result.ponchtml: Tá meas agam ar do ċuid oibreI admire your work.

result.ponchtml: Ullṁaiġ do ċuid fear ċun cogaiḋPrepare your men for war.

result.eng: I have a shower, I put my clothes on, I brush my teeth, and so on.

result.eng: How good is your Spanish?

result.eng: We are [usually] in the library and the lab most of the time.
result.ga: Bíonn muid sa leabharlann agus sa saotharlann an chuid is mó den am

result.eng: My classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.

result.eng: I have my whistles here in my bag.

result.eng: Take off your clothes.

result.ponchtml: Bain díot do ċuid éadaíTake off your clothes.

result.eng: I get on well with her, for the most part.
result.ga: Réitím go maith léi den chuid is mó

result.eng: Some of the horses got scared.

result.html: Tháinig eagla ar chuid de na capaillSome of the horses got scared.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig eagla ar ċuid de na capaillSome of the horses got scared.

result.eng: As part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.
result.ga: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealt

result.eng: My brothers were as thin as sticks.
result.ga: Bhí mo chuid deartháireacha chomh seang leis an maide

result.html: Bhí mo chuid deartháireacha chomh seang leis an maideMy brothers were as thin as sticks.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mo ċuid dearṫáireaċa ċoṁ seang leis an maideMy brothers were as thin as sticks.

result.eng: She would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.
result.ga: Thabharfadh sí an leabhar go raibh a chuid gruaige tar éis dul i léithe
result.orig: Thabharfadh sí an leabhar go raibh a chuid gruaige tar éis dul i léithe

result.ponchtml: Ṫaḃarfaḋ sí an leaḃar go raiḃ a ċuid gruaige tar éis dul i léiṫeShe would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.

result.eng: But many of them look tired now.

result.eng: The brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.
result.ga: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointe

result.ponchtml: Éilíonn gontaċt na formáide 140 caraċtar naċ dtéann an scríḃneoir ċun fadála ina ċuid smaointeThe brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.

result.eng: Most of the country's businesses are in private ownership.

result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuid is mó de ġnólaċtaí na tíre i seilḃ ṗríoḃáideaċMost of the country's businesses are in private ownership.

result.eng: Now now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
result.ga: Seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéalta

result.eng: I'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin

result.eng: Shut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
result.ga: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidí
result.orig: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidí
result.html: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidíShut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
result.ponchtml: Druid do ḃéal ó do ċuid amaidíShut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
